Literature.Title: Low cationicity is important for systemic in vivo efficacy of database-derived peptides against drug-resistant Gram-positive pathogens.
Literature.Reference: Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A. 2019;116:13517-13522
Literature.Author: Mishra B, Lakshmaiah Narayana J, Lushnikova T, Wang X, Wang G

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus USA 300(MIC=1.56µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=>25µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=3.1-6.25µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC=3.1µM)
